welcomeModal.plan: How are you planning on using Blona?
welcomeModal.search-msg: If you're looking to search through, chat with, or ask direct questions of your organization's knowledge, then this is the option for you!
welcomeModal.chatgpt-msg: If you're looking for a pure ChatGPT-like experience, then this is the option for you!

admin.connector-text: Connect Danswer to your organization's knowledge sources. We'll automatically sync your data into Danswer, so you can find exactly what you're looking for in one place.
admin.import-text: Connect to pieces of knowledge that live outside your apps. Upload files, scrape websites, or connect to your organization's Google Site.
admin.setup-text: Setup auto-syncing from your organization's most used apps and services. Unless otherwise specified during the connector setup, we will pull in the latest updates from the source every 10 minutes.

assistants.delete-assistant-text: Click the button below to permanently delete this assistant.
assistants.author: Author
assistants.view-assistant-text: Discover and create custom assistants that combine instructions, extra knowledge, and any combination of tools.
assistants.remove-error-no-assistant: Cannot remove {assistantName} - you must have at least one assistant.
assistants.remove-success: {assistantName} has been removed from your list.
assistants.remove-error: {assistantName} could not be removed from your list.
assistants.add-assistant: {assistantName} has been removed to your list.
assistants.add-assistant-error: {assistantName} could not be added to your list.

chat.llm-context-limit: LLM context limit reached ðŸ˜” If you want to chat with this document, please de-select others to free up space.
chat.documents-msg: Select to add to continuous context
chat.no-documents-found: No documents found for the query.
chat.documents-question: When you run ask a question, the retrieved documents will show up here!
chat.delete-folder-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {folderName}? All the content inside this folder will also be deleted
chat.message-placeholder: Send a message or @ to tag an assistant...
